aka: Can Somebody Tell Me That Everything Will Be Fine
this_title: Kan någon säga till mig att allt blir bra
trans_title: 有人能告诉我一切都会好起来的吗
Can Somebody Tell Me That Everything Will Be Fine
introduction: A short film based on authentic chats from an Internet forum. The film deals with how we talk to each other online, and portrays how many of us seek guidance and confirmation to help us maneuver in a world that seems confusing and strange.
chinese_title: 有人能告诉我一切都会好起来的吗
foreign_title: Kan någon säga till mig att allt blir bra
